about.title: About AgriNova
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing agriculture with AI-powered insights for a sustainable future
about.missionText: At AgriNova, we're on a mission to transform traditional farming into smart, data-driven agriculture. We believe that every farmer deserves access to cutting-edge technology that can help them make better decisions, increase yields, and maximize profits.
about.whatWeDoDesc: We combine real-time weather data, soil conditions, and historical patterns to provide the most accurate crop recommendations for your farm.
about.dataCollectionDesc: We gather real-time weather data, soil information, and historical agricultural patterns.
about.aiAnalysisDesc: Our machine learning models analyze multiple factors to find the best crop matches.
about.recommendationsDesc: We provide detailed insights on suitability, profit estimates, and production forecasts.
about.missionDrivenDesc: We exist to empower farmers with AI technology for sustainable agriculture.
about.innovationFirstDesc: Constantly improving our algorithms to provide the most accurate recommendations.
about.farmerCentricDesc: Every feature we build is designed with farmers' needs in mind.
about.trustTransparencyDesc: Clear, honest recommendations you can rely on for your farming decisions.
about.technologyDesc: We use advanced machine learning algorithms trained on extensive agricultural datasets to provide accurate crop recommendations. Our system integrates live weather APIs, soil analysis, and market price data to give you comprehensive insights for informed decision-making.
about.tech1: 90%+ prediction accuracy with Random Forest ML models
about.tech2: Real-time weather integration for up-to-date recommendations
about.tech4: Continuous learning and improvement of algorithms

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the passionate experts behind AgriNova dedicated to transforming agriculture
team.expertsDesc: Our team combines decades of agricultural expertise with cutting-edge technology to deliver the best solutions for farmers. From soil scientists to AI engineers, we're united by a common goal: making farming smarter and more profitable.
team.member1Bio: 20+ years of experience in agricultural research and crop optimization. PhD in Agricultural Science from IARI.
team.member2Bio: Expert in machine learning and AI applications in agriculture. Previously led ML teams at tech startups.
team.member3Bio: Passionate about bringing technology to farmers. 10+ years in agtech product development.
team.member4Bio: Creating intuitive experiences for agricultural technology. Focus on farmer-centric design.
team.joinTeamDesc: We're always looking for passionate individuals to help us revolutionize agriculture.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AgriNova
faq.q1: How accurate are the crop recommendations?
faq.a1: Our AI model has been trained on extensive agricultural data and achieves over 90% accuracy in crop recommendations. The system considers multiple factors including weather, soil type, water availability, and historical data to provide reliable suggestions.
faq.q2: How does the weather integration work?
faq.a2: We integrate with OpenWeatherMap API to fetch real-time weather data for your selected location. This includes temperature, rainfall, humidity, cloud cover, and other meteorological factors that influence crop growth.
faq.q3: Can I use AgriNova for any location in India?
faq.a3: Currently, AgriNova is optimized for Gujarat state with data from 26+ cities. We're continuously expanding our coverage to include more states and regions across India.
faq.a4: Yes! We offer a free tier that includes basic crop recommendations. For advanced features like detailed analytics, historical data, and priority support, we offer affordable premium plans.
faq.a5: No hidden charges whatsoever. All our pricing is transparent and clearly displayed. You only pay for the plan you choose.
faq.a6: Profit calculations are based on historical production data, current market prices, and your specified land area. We provide both per-acre and total profit estimates to help you make informed decisions.
faq.q7: Do I need technical knowledge to use AgriNova?
faq.a7: Not at all! AgriNova is designed with farmers in mind. The interface is intuitive and easy to use. Simply input your farm details, and our system will provide recommendations in a clear, understandable format.
faq.q8: Can I get recommendations for multiple crops?
faq.a8: Yes! Our system provides the top 6 crop recommendations ranked by suitability. You can view the top 3 initially and expand to see 3 more alternatives.
faq.a9: Yes, we take data security seriously. All user data is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.
faq.q10: How often is the data updated?
faq.a10: Weather data is fetched in real-time whenever you make a prediction. Our crop database and pricing information are updated regularly to ensure accuracy.
faq.stillQuestionsDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat with our friendly team.

terms.disclaimer: AgriNova provides AI-powered crop predictions based on historical data. These predictions are NOT guarantees and should NOT replace professional agricultural advice.
terms.disclaimer1: Predictions may not account for unforeseen weather, market, or environmental changes
terms.disclaimer2: Results vary based on local conditions and farming practices
terms.disclaimer3: Always consult qualified agricultural professionals before making farming decisions
terms.disclaimer4: AgriNova is a decision-support tool, not a replacement for expertise
terms.section2Text: By using AgriNova, you agree to provide accurate information, keep your account secure, and not misuse the service. You are responsible for all activities under your account. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
terms.maxExtent: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW:
terms.liability1: AgriNova is provided "AS IS" without warranties of any kind
terms.liability2: We are NOT liable for crop failures, financial losses, or damages from using our predictions
terms.liability3: We are NOT responsible for decisions made based on our recommendations
terms.liability4: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service (if any)
terms.section4Text: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use after changes means you accept the new terms. For questions, contact us at
terms.acknowledgment: BY USING AGRINOVA, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ AND AGREE TO THESE TERMS.

privacy.section1Text: We collect your name, email, and password when you create an account. If you use Google Sign-In, we collect your Google profile information. We also collect agricultural data you provide (location, soil type, crop preferences) to generate predictions.
privacy.section2Text: We use your information to provide crop predictions, authenticate your account, send password reset emails, and improve our machine learning models. We do NOT sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section3Text: Your password is encrypted using industry-standard Argon2 hashing. We use JWT tokens for secure authentication and HTTPS for all data transmission. While we implement strong security measures, no system is 100% secure.
privacy.section4Text: You can access, update, or delete your account data at any time. To exercise these rights or for any privacy concerns, contact us at

cookie.section1Text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and login status.
cookie.section2_1Text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function:
cookie.authTokenDesc: Keeps you logged in (JWT token in localStorage)
cookie.usage1: Keep you logged in to your account
cookie.usage2: Remember your theme and display preferences
cookie.usage3: Improve website performance and user experience
cookie.section4Text: We use the following third-party services that may set cookies:
cookie.googleOAuthDesc: For authentication (subject to Google's Cookie Policy)
cookie.manage1: Our cookie consent banner (appears on first visit)
cookie.manage2: Your browser settings (may affect website functionality)
cookie.manage3: Clearing your browser's cache and cookies
cookie.manageNote: Note: Disabling essential cookies may prevent you from using certain features of the website.
cookie.section6Text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.
cookie.section7Text: If you have questions about our use of cookies, contact us at:
cookie.moreInfo: For more information about how we handle your data, please read our
